title: Penne with Prawns in a Garlic Tomato Sauce
ingredients: ['1 (500g) pack penne pasta', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1/2 red onion, chopped', '6 cloves garlic, chopped', '4 tablespoons white wine', '2 (400g) tins chopped tomatoes', '500g (1 1/4 lb) prawns, peeled and deveined', '100g (4 oz) grated Parmesan cheese']
